feed.title: Simon Park
feed.subtitle: A personal website for Simon Park. Based on [*folio](https://github.com/bogoli/-folio) design.

entry.title: Email Content Extraction
entry.summary: Proposed a double fine-tuning method to train a model that can extract key information from promotional emails from student organizations.

entry.title: Infinite-Width 1-Layer ReLU Networks with L2 Regularization on 2D Data

link.title: Infinite-Width 1-Layer ReLU Networks with L2 Regularization on 2D Data

entry.summary: Given a dataset of two-dimensional input and one-dimensional output, investigated the set of 1-layer ReLU networks that interpolate the dataset and, among such interpolants, minimize the L2 norm of the weights. Considered datasets where the points either form the vertices of a regular polygon, or are symmetric with respect to a line.

entry.title: What Makes In-Context Learning Work On Generative QA Tasks?

link.title: What Makes In-Context Learning Work On Generative QA Tasks?

entry.summary: Analyzed the effect of different components of in-context learning demonstrations on the capabilities of large language models on generative QA tasks.

entry.title: Data Valuation with Shapley Values
entry.summary: Analyzed the robustness of Shapley values across different training settings. Proposed a novel approach of approximating Shapley values by evaluating on simpler models with similarly expressive power

entry.title: PhoLSTM - A Joint Multi-task Model in Vietnamese Natural Language Processing

link.title: PhoLSTM - A Joint Multi-task Model in Vietnamese Natural Language Processing

entry.summary: Proposed a variation of a joint multi-task language model for Vietnamese that outperforms the baseline model

entry.title: Extension of Simple Algorithms to the Matroid Secretary Problem

link.title: Extension of Simple Algorithms to the Matroid Secretary Problem

entry.summary: Proposed multiple algorithms for the Matroid Secretary Problem generalized from the ordinary Secretary Problem. Proved their properties using the greedy algorithm and forbidden set frameworks

entry.title: Free-Order Matroid Secretary Problem
entry.summary: Proposed a variation to an algorithm with a competitive ratio of 4. For uniform matroids, proved that the variation has a constant competitive ratio. Conjectured that the ratio converges to e if the size of the matroid tends to infinity. For general matroids, empirically observed that the algorithm is likely to have a competitive ratio close to e

entry.title: Applications of Polynomial Methods
entry.summary: Studied how polynomial methods can be applied to Joints and Nikodym Problems

entry.title: Resiliency of East Asian Air Network to Adversarial Attacks

link.title: Resiliency of East Asian Air Network to Adversarial Attacks

entry.summary: Through simulations, presented that the East Asian air network is more robust to adversarial attacks than the global network

entry.title: Prediction of Seoul Metro Ridership
entry.summary: Designed a LSTM model to predict the hourly ridership of Seoul metro
